body:
Your next steps sound good.

Another thought occurred to me: This proposal appears on the surface to be compatible with the status quo. But for a long time we have been recommending that people change import paths when they introduce backward-incompatible changes. This proposal gives the opposite advice: tag your incompatible major release with a new major version number, but keep the import path the same. We need to think about the *process* upgrade path for people who have been following our advice.
